jd: From: ashok, hclglobal ashok@hclglobal.com Reply to: ashok@hclglobal.com Job Title-Java Actimize DeveloperLocation – New York, NY Complete onsiteMandatory Skill-ActimizeJava SQLJSONExpectations from this role:Act creatively to develop applications and select appropriate technical options, optimizing application development, maintenance and performance by employing design patterns and reusing proven solutions, account for others' developmental activities1. Number of non compliance issues7.
